snippet: A former New York City police officer was sentenced to more than three years in prison in a gun smuggling case that ensnared members of the Police Department.
abstract: Former New York City Police Officer Joseph Trischitta is sentenced to more than three years in prison in a gun smuggling case that ensnared active-duty and other former members of the department.
lead_paragraph: A former New York City police officer was sentenced to more than three years in prison in a gun smuggling case that ensnared members of the Police Department.

headline.seo: Ex-Officer Is Sentenced to Prison in Gun Smuggling Case
